text: Enywe Abasubili mube abahabini ba Nyasaye, Shinga Yesu yareeba abechi bebe, mbu niwina umuhabini wanje khu Nyasaye ? abechi be nibaboola mbu Efwe khuli abahabini ba Nyasayeâ€ Mana nikusuubila omukanda okhurula mubana ba Israil, ne okundi nikukhaya, kho nikhukhoonya kulia okwasuubila khubasuku bakwo, nikushila
